value: Improving the pre-screening of eligible patients in order to increase enrollment in cancer clinical trials

The performance of randomized controlled trials (RCTs) is often hindered by recruitment difficulties. This study aims to explore the pre-screening phase of four prostate cancer RCTs to identify the impact of a systematic pre-selection of eligible patients for RCT recruitment.

            including the multidisciplinary cancer (MDC) meeting.

Venn diagram of the pre-screening of patients eligible for four randomized clinical
            trials carried out at the Comprehensive Cancer Center in Rennes (GETUG 14, 15, 16,
            and 17).
